name: x-openapi-flow-local-example
description: Local playground to test x-openapi-flow with OpenAPI + Swagger UI

scripts.validate: npm run apply && x-openapi-flow validate swagger.flow.json --profile strict
scripts.lint: npm run apply && x-openapi-flow lint swagger.flow.json
scripts.graph: npm run apply && x-openapi-flow graph swagger.flow.json
